value.title: 2 ways to rotate Power BI tabs
value.excerpt: If you want to show your power bi report on a TV or web browser and have the tabs rotate at a interval you specify, this video is for you. I will show you two ways to do that. value.title: 3 Best practices when transforming data in Power BI Desktop
